comments.text:
I should be able to have a shortcut from an email message to turn it to an event. 

Ideally Thunderbird/Calendar should guess where and when, but at least being able to have the email content in the description would be nice.
comments.creator: hub@figuiere.net
comments.raw_text:
I should be able to have a shortcut from an email message to turn it to an event. 

Ideally Thunderbird/Calendar should guess where and when, but at least being able to have the email content in the description would be nice.
You can right-click an email message in the list and select Convert To -> Event
